participant_1.background:
My parents were born in Europe, but I was born in the United States.
I'm looking for a place to move with a climate that's better for my skin.
I am a couponer and I need to be close to the grocery store to maximize my savings.
wedding cakes are my specialty.
i play tabletop games with friends.

participant_2.background:
I try my best to keep up with my family, but it can be difficult with my busy schedule.
I want to take my uniform off and relax.
i enjoy broadway shows.
i am the youngest of 3.
my parents are in there 80s.

content.text: Hello, my name is Jenny. What's your name?
My name is John. It's nice to meet you, Jenny.
Nice to meet you too, John. What do you do for a living?
I'm a baker. I make wedding cakes.
That's so cool! I love baking. I'm a nurse, but I love to relax by taking acting classes.
That's awesome! I love broadway shows. I'm always trying to find new ones to see.
Have you seen any good ones lately?
I saw the Phantom of the Opera a few weeks ago. It was amazing!
I love that show! I've seen it a few times.
What's your favorite part of the show?
I love the music and the costumes. They're so beautiful!
Me too! The music is so haunting.
I know, right? It gives me chills every time I hear it.
I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! I'm always looking for new people to talk to about broadway shows.
Well, now you have a friend to talk to about them.
